snippet: Mr. Zaslow was a columnist and author whose books included a best seller with Randy Pausch and a chronicle of Gabrielle Giffords’s recovery.
abstract: Jeffrey Zaslow, a columnist and best-selling author whose books included chronicles of a dying professor’s last lecture, a pilot who landed a crippled commercial airliner in the Hudson River and Rep Gabrielle Giffords’s recovery from wounds in a horrific shooting in Arizona, dies at age 53.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Zaslow was a columnist and author whose books included a best seller with Randy Pausch and a chronicle of Gabrielle Giffords’s recovery.

headline.seo: Jeffrey Zaslow, Best-Selling Author, Dies at 53
headline.main: Jeffrey Zaslow, Columnist and Author of ‘The Last Lecture,’ Dies at 53
headline.print_headline: Jeffrey Zaslow, 53, Columnist and Author of ‘The Last Lecture’, Dies
